name: Solaris (itch) (wenright)
description:
You've just stolen an experimental solar-powered laser weapon and must try to escape!

Hang out around the wells of light to recharge your weapon, and use it to blast openings if you get stuck.

Arrow keys to move, z to shoot, and up arrow to jump.

If controls aren't working on the web player, click on the blue area around the game's window to give it focus.
